Well that happened.

I believe point of view does have something to do with setting Netorare and Netori apart, but it goes beyond that.

Just think about it a little: Why Netorare hentais are often protagonized by lovely females which get assaulted by ugly and often half-bald middle aged men and Netori by sometimes equaly sadistic but often younger, better looking men rampanging on good looking girls with horrible personalities?

Simply, because it's exactly the side which the reader roots for that sets the rules. Netorare is meant to be a regrettable fap, and leave a bad aftertaste (however if you are already rotten to the core, you might as well not), whereas Netori is meant to give a sense of justice served, even if it is often distorted.

I could never understand why all of the Vanillafags commenting about moral on a NTR hentai. There is a lot more fucked up hentai out there ( rape, drug, mind control, gore, vore,etc), and they choose the most tame one.

@FapOS the entire Hentai community is retarded at this point, Vanilla fans can't even leave NTR tagged doujins without commenting "kill all cucks" or "kys cucks" and NTR fandoms are just flaming by response. Why couldn't people in this website think straight and just ignore NTR if they don't like it instead of dissing on one just to look cool.

P.S. this doujin is Netori more than Netorare.

@Ecchinosuke

Since some of you still thinks that this isn't netorare, then see this https://nhentai.net/g/140263 why it's tagged netorare? the bf never found out he got cucked but it's tagged as netorare, it's the same thing with this pokemon hentai, if you think the phone call from Lillie wasn't enough to find out she got cucked then it's the same thing as the bf not finding out he got cucked but it has a netorare tag. The guy and the gf in that hentai is the same thing as Mallow and Sun respectively, it's just the genders are opposite. If you think this pokemon hentai is not netorare then the hentai I linked above is not netorare too and that tagged should be removed. If you still disagree then you're a lost cause, I can only assume that you have double standards that you fail to see a female can be cucked too.
